channel.title: Developing: New Command Creator Basic (Noob-friendly) (Pictures)
channel.description:
[IMG]http://img101.imageshack.us/img101/2706/codereasynn2.png[/img]
Its in the developing phase seeing as currently I only have Else if, if, sendMessage, addItem, addskill, etc. I have to add a little bit more. You can basically design your code, and then copy and paste. It's developed in visual basic (fairly easy) More pictures coming soon.
